summary: fixes wooden head mannequin for those who use skin replacer for mannequin
descriptionHtml:
If you use http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4164 and found wooden head bug

1. Change ALL the mannequin into 1 race of your favorites (remember only 1 race, i choose redguard), I only need to do this in dovahkiin hideout (I think you can do it anywhere, but I\'m not so sure)... 

2. Save Your game 

3. Load your newly saved game 

4. Exit the house without ANY interaction with things in the house... then re-enter it 

5. Your Mannequin EVERYWHERE should be your choice of race
author: Soundof yogi
